UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Comparative Antimicrobial Activity of Hp404 Peptide and Its Analogs against Acinetobacter baumannii.
Literature.Author: Hong MJ, Kim MK, Park Y

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Mouse erythrocytes:1.7% Hemolysis=25 µM,Mouse erythrocytes:15.9% Hemolysis=50 µM,Human keratinocytes HaCat:0% Killing=50 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=3.13µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=12.5µM),Bacillus cereus KCTC 1012(MIC=25µM),Listeria monocytogenes KCTC 3710(MIC=6.25µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=25µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae KCTC 2208(MIC=12.5µM),Acinetobacter baumannii KCTC 2508(MIC=3.13µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=3.13µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=12.5µM),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=3.13µM),Acinetobacter baumannii KCTC 2508(MIC=6.25µM),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=3.13-12.5µM)
